name: Bomber Game
description:
Your country has been attacked by enemy forces. You are the only one who can stop them! Take your fighter and go. Track them, BOMB them and destroy!

Infinite amount of arcade fun. Collect upgrades, unlock fighters, aim and bomb! Climb up in the leaderboard to become the best pilot in the world and earn ethernal glory!

Bomber Game features:
- Infinite number of leves.
- Two types of controls: touch and virtual joystick.
- Tons of enemies to beat including powerful bosses!
- Two types of fighters - each with different spectacular special weapon. Attack your enemies with napalm or destroy them with the atomic bomb!
- Global leaderboard - become the best pilot in the world.
